title: Island of Secrets 3: To Open a Book Brings Adventure
description: Four children from the 1940’s and one who they rescued on one of their many trips in time is from 2080, her name is Zara and has now been adopted by the family of the other four. In this story they travel to were Zara lived in 2080 to try and find her family. Once they return to the 1940’s Nick decides he wants to go to Dunkirk and see for himself what happened, this turns out to be a little dangerous as Ed is slightly wounded saving Nick’s life.
author: Neville J. Anderson-Budd
